required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observe the Effectiveness and Safety of Ranibizumab in Real Life Setting
clinical_study.official_title: LUMINOUS: Study to Observe the Effectiveness and Safety of Ranibizumab Through Individualized Patient Treatment and Associated Outcomes

brief_summary.textblock: This study will describe the long-term safety and effectiveness, treatment patterns,and patient reported quality of life associated with ranibizumab treatment in routine clinical practice for all approved indication included in the local product label.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Visual Acuity (VA) and mean change in VA
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3,6, and 12 months from the baseline visit, and annually thereafter

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate, relationship and severity of treatment emergent ocular and non-ocular adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Defined time periods during study duration from FPFV until 30 days after LPLV

primary_outcome.measure: Mean visual acuity at quarterly intervals for the primary treated eye set
primary_outcome.time_frame: Quarterly intervals from baseline visit during study duration (5 years)

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate of Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the time the patient signed the informed consent until 30 days after study discontinuation

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of ranibizumab injections administered per patient, per eye, and per person-year
"National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire-25" change from baseline
Overall number of ranibizumab injections, number of visits, time interval between injections, duration of treatment, number of re-treatment, and reasons for treatment termination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over time during study duration (5 years)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in National Eye Institute Visual Function Questionnaire 25 composite and sub-scale scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over time during study duration (5 years)

clinical_study.condition: Wet Age Related Macular Degeneration, Diabetic Macular Edema, Retinal Vein Occlusion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients, within age limits as defined by local regulations and local product label, who have previously been treated with, who are currently being treated with or initiating treatment with ranibizumab for any approved indication included in the local product label
- Willing and able to provide informed written consent personally or by legal proxy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Simultaneous participation in a study that includes administration of any investigational drug or procedure
- Systemic or ocular treatment with any VEGF inhibitor other than ranibizumab in the 90 days prior to enrollment
- Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply

clinical_study.keyword: Ophthalmology, age-related macular degeneration, Diabetic Macular Edema, Retinal Vein Occlusion, ranibizumab
